DOC.brief_summary: Our group previously conduct study look performance three style positive airway pressure mask laboratory treatment study obstructive sleep apnea , find patient use full-mask mask require higher positive airway pressure patient use nasal nasal pillow style mask achieve successful reduction respiratory event . In current study want randomly assign patient either nasal full-face mask switch different mask ( nasal originally choose mask switch full-face vise versa ) 3-weeks use see number respiratory event change different mask style . We expect number respiratory event increase use full-face mask .
DOC.brief_title: Differences Efficacy Between Nasal Oronasal Masks Treatment Obstructive Sleep Apnea With Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP )
DOC.criteria: 18 year old previously diagnose OSA return PAP titration Center Sleep Medicine CPAP titration naive Must Apnea/Hypopnea Index ( AHI ) ≥ 16/hr . Patients ≥ 50 % central apnea
